title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt Snapshot

view.title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt
view.subtitle: Second concurrent booking created.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Read reporting endpoints and verify booking totals, counts, and statuses align with saga actions.
data.expectedResult: Reported metrics match booking actions and highlight any discrepancies for schema/API iteration.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

data.instruction: Simulate customer joining waitlist/queue or prepaying for limited batch capacity.
data.expectedResult: System records customer demand in queue/waitlist model and exposes deterministic status transitions.
